typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		row_id as string,
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(output(
		id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		update_type as string,
		status as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HistoricClients
Lookup1 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(source2@id))) ~> AlterRow1
source1, ExistingIds lookup(source1@id == source2@id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(source2@id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
HistoricClients, ExistingIds lookup(id == existing_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_id)),
	updateIf(!isNull(existing_id))) ~> AlterRow2
source2 select(mapColumn(
		existing_id = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingIds
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
